Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: ResourceUsage and SystemRole marked for deprecation in 3.5
GradingAssignment and GradingAssignmentScore updated after Assessment workshops
StudentGrade and MarkValueInfo added after Assessment workshops
NAPLAN PNP Codeset - BRA deleted and values ETD and OFF added as per advice from ACARA
LearningStandardDocument and LearningStandardItem updated to Venetian Blind Typing
Other minor typos, broken links updated in various descriptions
Privacy Ratings added as annotations at Object Level
